author: - Domi44
comment: I like the watch face, but thought there was a glitch initially, and gave a 3 star review, but since, the devoper  got back and explained what I was doing wrong. Thank you and I really glad he did, since I find this a very sharp looking and practical watch face. Worth every penny of the dollar it costs.

reply.author: ezcapeHax
reply.content: Just tap the center of the face when the weather is open to go back to the watch face. If you have any other questions please email me.

author: James Kampfer
comment: Looks great but keeps killing the battery and freezing on my moto 360. Will have to uninstall unfortunately

reply.author: ezcapeHax
reply.content: I wish you would've given me a chance to help.

title: Looks Great,  but very buggy

author: Bruce Patron
comment: This is a unique watch face with some of the smoothest animations I've ever seen. Battery life is great. Developer is very quick and helpful with email responses.
title: Awesome face
